title: Power cut schedule for next week announced: One hour power cut on Poson Poya day
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) today announced power cuts schedule to be imposed island-wide from 13th May to 19th May.
Accordingly, one hour power cuts will be imposed on the Poson Poya Day which falls on May 14  and on Sunday, the 19th of May.
Two hours and 15 minutes power cut will be imposed on 13th May and 15th to 18th May.
